title: 3d Dice Roll
bio: This project simulates a 3D dice roll using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's a fun and interactive way to understand basic animations and transformations in web development. Perfect for beginners to learn how to create dynamic visual effects.

title: Progress Bar
bio: A simple progress bar project that demonstrates how to create and animate progress bars using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's a great way to learn about animations and dynamic updates in web development.

title: Sidebar
bio: This project showcases a responsive sidebar menu using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's ideal for beginners to understand how to create navigation menus that work seamlessly across different devices.

title: Age Calculator
bio: An age calculator project that calculates a user's age based on their birthdate. It's a practical example of how to handle date inputs and perform calculations using JavaScript.

title: Indian Flag
bio: A creative project that uses HTML and CSS to draw the Indian flag. It's a great way to learn about CSS positioning, gradients, and shapes.

title: Q And A
bio: A simple Q&A project where users can ask questions and get answers. It's a great way to learn about form handling and basic JavaScript logic.

title: Social Media Navigation
bio: This project demonstrates how to create a social media navigation bar using HTML and CSS. It's perfect for beginners to learn about styling and layout techniques.

title: Background Color Changer
bio: A fun project that allows users to change the background color of a webpage dynamically. It's a great way to learn about event handling and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Loading Bar
bio: This project creates a loading bar animation using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's a great way to learn about animations and how to simulate loading processes.

title: Quiz App
bio: A simple quiz app that tests users' knowledge on various topics. It's a great way to learn about handling user inputs, scoring, and dynamic content updates in JavaScript.

title: Random Bg Changer
bio: This project changes the background color of a webpage randomly at regular intervals. It's a fun way to learn about JavaScript timing functions and DOM manipulation.

title: Temprature Converter
bio: A temperature converter project that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. It's a great way to learn about form inputs and JavaScript calculations.

title: Bubble Game
bio: A fun bubble-popping game where users click on bubbles to score points. It's a great way to learn about game logic, event handling, and animations in JavaScript.

title: Mini Calendar
bio: A mini calendar project that displays the current month and date. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript date objects and dynamic content rendering.

title: Multiplication App
bio: A simple multiplication app that helps users practice their multiplication tables. It's a great way to learn about form handling and JavaScript logic.

title: Random Image Feed
bio: This project displays a random image feed using an external API. It's a great way to learn about API integration and asynchronous JavaScript.

title: Random Password Generator
bio: A random password generator that creates secure passwords based on user preferences. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript string manipulation and randomization.

title: To Do List
bio: A simple to-do list app that allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as complete. It's a great way to learn about CRUD operations and local storage in JavaScript.

title: Counter
bio: A basic counter project that allows users to increment and decrement a number. It's a great way to learn about event handling and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Note App
bio: A note-taking app that allows users to create, edit, and delete notes. It's a great way to learn about CRUD operations and local storage in JavaScript.

title: Random Photos
bio: This project displays random photos fetched from an external API. It's a great way to learn about API integration and asynchronous JavaScript.

title: Random Quote Generator
bio: A random quote generator that displays inspirational quotes fetched from an external API. It's a great way to learn about API integration and DOM manipulation.

title: Real Time Character Counter
bio: This project counts the number of characters entered in a text area in real-time. It's a great way to learn about event handling and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Recipe Book App
bio: A recipe book app that allows users to add, view, and delete recipes. It's a great way to learn about CRUD operations and local storage in JavaScript.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
bio: A simple rock-paper-scissors game where users can play against the computer. It's a great way to learn about game logic and JavaScript randomization.

title: Save Kangroo Game
bio: A fun game where users help a kangaroo avoid obstacles. It's a great way to learn about game logic, animations, and event handling in JavaScript.

title: Stopwatch
bio: A stopwatch project that allows users to start, stop, and reset a timer. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript timing functions and DOM manipulation.

title: Tip Calculator
bio: A tip calculator that helps users calculate the tip amount based on the bill total and service quality. It's a great way to learn about form handling and JavaScript calculations.

title: Video Trailer Popup
bio: This project displays a video trailer in a popup window when a button is clicked. It's a great way to learn about modal windows and event handling in JavaScript.

title: Weather App
bio: A weather app that fetches and displays the current weather conditions for a given location. It's a great way to learn about API integration and asynchronous JavaScript.

title: Weight Converter
bio: A weight converter project that converts weights between kilograms, pounds, and ounces. It's a great way to learn about form inputs and JavaScript calculations.

title: English Dictionary App
bio: An English dictionary app that allows users to search for word definitions. It's a great way to learn about API integration and dynamic content rendering.

title: Photo Gallery
bio: A photo gallery project that displays a collection of images in a grid layout. It's a great way to learn about CSS grid and image handling in web development.

title: Pomodoro Timer
bio: A Pomodoro timer project that helps users manage their work and break times. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript timing functions and DOM manipulation.

title: Press The Key Project
bio: This project displays the key pressed by the user on the screen. It's a great way to learn about event handling and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Profile Stats
bio: A profile stats project that displays user statistics in a visually appealing way. It's a great way to learn about data visualization and CSS styling.

title: Heart Trail Animation
bio: This project creates a heart trail animation that follows the mouse cursor. It's a great way to learn about CSS animations and JavaScript event handling.

title: Image Search App
bio: An image search app that allows users to search for images using an external API. It's a great way to learn about API integration and dynamic content rendering.

title: Image Slider
bio: An image slider project that displays a series of images in a slideshow format. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript timing functions and DOM manipulation.

title: Loan Calculator
bio: A loan calculator project that calculates monthly loan payments based on the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term. It's a great way to learn about form handling and JavaScript calculations.

title: Mouse Event Project
bio: This project demonstrates various mouse events like click, hover, and drag. It's a great way to learn about event handling and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Navbar
bio: A responsive navbar project that works seamlessly across different devices. It's a great way to learn about CSS flexbox and media queries.

title: Number Guessing Game
bio: A number guessing game where users guess a randomly generated number. It's a great way to learn about game logic and JavaScript randomization.

title: Random Color
bio: This project generates random colors and displays them on the screen. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript randomization and DOM manipulation.

title: Random Emoji
bio: This project displays random emojis on the screen. It's a fun way to learn about JavaScript randomization and DOM manipulation.

title: Testimonial Slider
bio: A testimonial slider project that displays user testimonials in a slideshow format. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript timing functions and DOM manipulation.

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
bio: A classic tic-tac-toe game where users can play against the computer. It's a great way to learn about game logic and JavaScript randomization.

title: Digital Clock
bio: A digital clock project that displays the current time. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript date objects and DOM manipulation.

title: Bmi Calculator
bio: A BMI calculator project that calculates the Body Mass Index based on user inputs. It's a great way to learn about form handling and JavaScript calculations.

title: Color Scheme Switcher
bio: This project allows users to switch between different color schemes for a webpage. It's a great way to learn about CSS variables and JavaScript event handling.

title: Calculator
bio: A simple calculator project that performs basic arithmetic operations. It's a great way to learn about JavaScript logic and DOM manipulation.
